sojourn.compartment_periods_calculated.e.rationale: Estimates of the incubation period have included 5.1 days, 5.2 days and 4.8 days \cite{RN7, RN12, RN8, RN10}. A systematic review \cite{RN13} found that data are best fitted by a log-normal distribution (mean 5.8 days, CI 5.0 to 6.7, median 5.1 days). Our systematic review \cite{RN17} found that estimates of the mean incubation period have varied from 3.6 to 7.4 days.
